## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description            | Type                                       | Default  |
| -------- | --------- | ---------------------- | ------------------------------------------ | -------- |
| `type`   | `type`    | The type of the alert. | `"error" \| "info" \| "success" \| "warn"` | `'info'` |
